QuestData.Title: Not Without My Honor
QuestData.Description: The blade is not the only important item a blademaster carries.$B$BOnce he has passed his final tests in the Masters' Caverns, the blademaster is given the honor of wearing the Burning Blade's banner.$B$BWhen my petition to reclaim my rightful place with the clan fell upon deaf and craven ears, I was stripped of that honor.$B$BNo doubt, my banner has been stored away somewhere in Hallvalor. They'll give it to some other aspiring blademaster if they don't burn it first.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the Blademaster's Banner in a Burning Blade Locker.
QuestData.RewardText: I don't expect you to understand the importance of what you've done.$B$BPerhaps one day you will.
